channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15029] Add logic to estimate stats for BETWEEN operator
item.description: Currently, BETWEEN operator is considered in the default case: reduces the input rows to the half. This may lead to wrong estimates for the number of rows produced by Filter operators.
item.summary: Add logic to estimate stats for BETWEEN operator

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
